QuestData.Title: Terminal Degree
QuestData.Description:
That's everyone but Nigel.
He's in the big cave! I bet he went in there to look for relics, but now he's tied up!
Would you save him too?
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Cragg the Stoneshaker and free Nigel Rifthold.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you for saving my grandson and his friends.$b$B I'm sure they will make fine explorers when they're adults.$b$bWhich will be about the time they are no longer grounded!
